name: Anti-Apophis Wristwatch
description:
The asteroid Apophis is approaching Earth.

It will land in 10 seconds...

Luckily, Malcolm has his trusty anti-Apophis wristwatch! Wield physics, platforming, and time-bending to help Malcolm survive.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51 (compo), with the theme Every 10 Seconds.

Made with the bevy game engine and LDtk level editor.

Source Code: https://github.com/Trouv/ludum-dare-51
